Class ReclassEqualInterval

  • java.lang.Object

    public class ReclassEqualInterval
extends java.lang.Object
implements whitebox.interfaces.WhiteboxPlugin
    WhiteboxPlugin is used to define a plugin tool for Whitebox GIS.

      • getDescriptiveName

        public java.lang.String getDescriptiveName()
        Used to retrieve the plugin tool's descriptive name. This can be a longer name (containing spaces) and is used in the interface to list the tool.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        String containing the plugin descriptive name.

      • setPluginHost

        public void setPluginHost(whitebox.interfaces.WhiteboxPluginHost host)
        Sets the WhiteboxPluginHost to which the plugin tool is tied. This is the class that the plugin will send all feedback messages, progress updates, and return objects.
        Specified by:
        setPluginHost in interface whitebox.interfaces.WhiteboxPlugin
        Parameters:
        host - The WhiteboxPluginHost that called the plugin tool.

        Used to communicate a cancel operation from the Whitebox GUI.
        Specified by:
        setCancelOp in interface whitebox.interfaces.WhiteboxPlugin
        Parameters:
        cancel - Set to true if the plugin should be canceled.

        Specified by:
